attributes.description: Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager JP Thomas and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information, or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Select Vanderbijlpark.

attributes.description:
Mitsubishi’s Triton is a great alternative to the usual bakkies that we encounter on South African roads, with a strong heritage, and well known for reliability and dependability. Mitsubishi has introduced the latest GL model to their range, as a more pocket friendly version to accommodate fleet owners and SME’s alike. Build quality and interior finish remain of the highest standards. This particular Triton has been conveniently equipped with a tow bar, roll bar, rubberised load-bin, as well as smash n grab safety film for added peace of mind. 

Balance of Mitsubishi’s 3 year / 100’000Km warranty, and a 5 year / 90’000km service plan.   

Don't miss out. Call us now, or leave your details and we will be sure to call you.

Finance Can Be Arranged, Nationwide Delivery, Trade-ins Welcome, Full Service History.

Price Excludes Documentation and Registration Costs. E&OE

As one of the many MOTUS Select Pre-Owned dealerships, we pride ourselves in excellent service and offer vehicles that can be trusted and enjoyed. Customer satisfaction is our main priority! 

MOTUS: LIVE, LOVE, DRIVE…
